# cato_private_access_policy (Resource)

The `cato_private_access_policy` resource contains the configuration parameters for private access policies in the Cato platform.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "cato_private_access_policy" "example" {
  enabled = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `enabled` (Boolean) Is the private access policy enabled?

### Read-Only

- `audit` (Attributes) Audit log record (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--audit))

<a id="nestedatt--audit"></a>
### Nested Schema for `audit`

Read-Only:

- `published_by` (String) Author of the published log record
- `published_time` (String) Audit log published time
